name: Smith Chris
description: I am a down to earth guy with a good sense of humor. I am energetic, and outgoing. I try to live life to the fullest, because life is too short to dwell on the small stuff. I am a very honest, sincere, caring, and loyal guy. Also affectionate, faithful, and passionate. I am a a hard working guy with a good heart and and a lot of good qualities to offer to the right woman. A true genuine gentleman who knows how to love, treat, respect, and appreciate a lady. I am not a player, and i am not here for games.
